barker_notes.barker_summary: Statement of receipts from stamp tax.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1258-1259

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Statement of receipts from stamp tax.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*San Felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned* [Janua]ry 18th 1825 [1826?]*/p* *p*An Account of sums received for Stamp duty-*/p* *p**person_mentioned*Irons*/person_mentioned* to *person_mentioned*Groce*/person_mentioned*—Original Deed-------------------------------- $6:00*/p*
*p*Copy------------ $1:50*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1825">1825*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="02-xx-1825">feb */date_mentioned*3d—Petition to *person_mentioned*Congress*/person_mentioned*—Seal thereon------------------------- . 50*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="02-25-1825">25*/date_mentioned*-—*person_mentioned*Tally*/person_mentioned* to *person_mentioned*Pettus*/person_mentioned*-----------do---------------------------- .50*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="03-15-1825">March 15 */date_mentioned* *person_mentioned*Thomas Cartwright*/person_mentioned* to *person_mentioned*Solomon Williams*/person_mentioned*—Original Deed and copy—recd from *person_mentioned*Williams*/person_mentioned* L K-------- 2. 00*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="03-19-1825">19th*/date_mentioned* *person_mentioned*Stephen Richardson*/person_mentioned* to *person_mentioned*D. H. Milburn*/person_mentioned* Deed-------- 1. 50*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="04-02-1825">April 2d*/date_mentioned*—*person_mentioned*Marsh*/person_mentioned* to *person_mentioned*Frazer*/person_mentioned*---------------------------------------- 1. 50*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Same*/person_mentioned* to *person_mentioned*Shelby*/person_mentioned*--------------- 1. 50*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Bloodgood*/person_mentioned* to *person_mentioned*Ballew*/person_mentioned*-------------- 1. 50*/p*
*p*5th Petition to *person_mentioned*Legislature *location_mentioned*Co[a]huila and Texas*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned*---- .50*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="04-26-1825">26*/date_mentioned*. *person_mentioned*Smithers*/person_mentioned* to *person_mentioned*Callaughan*/person_mentioned* deed-------------------------------- 1.50*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="04-30-1825">30 */date_mentioned**person_mentioned*Floares*/person_mentioned* to *person_mentioned*Henry Williams*/person_mentioned*------------------------------- 1.50*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Pettus*/person_mentioned* to *person_mentioned*Royall*/person_mentioned*--------------------------------------- 1. 50*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Hughes*/person_mentioned* to *person_mentioned*Hudson*/person_mentioned*'s Note recd this *person_mentioned*L K-*/person_mentioned*------- . 50*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Hope*/person_mentioned* to *person_mentioned*Hope*/person_mentioned*-------- . 50*/p*
*p*do do -------------—---------------------------- . 50*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1825">1825*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**date_mentioned n="05-21-1825">May 21 */date_mentioned* Recepted for 38 seals a 1.50-----------------------------$57.*/p*
*p*50 at 50----------------------------------------------- 25.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Hope*/person_mentioned* to *person_mentioned*Cole*/person_mentioned*------------------------------------------ 2.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Cole*/person_mentioned* to *person_mentioned*Hope*/person_mentioned*------------------------------------------ 2.*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="06-11-1825">11 June */date_mentioned* *person_mentioned*Jones*/person_mentioned* to *person_mentioned*Fulcher*/person_mentioned*--------------------------------------- 1. 50*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Bloodgood*/person_mentioned* to *person_mentioned*Ingram*/person_mentioned* recd this *person_mentioned*L K-*/person_mentioned*----------------------- . 50*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Ingram*/person_mentioned* to *person_mentioned*Scott*/person_mentioned* Note----------------------------------- . 50*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Scott*/person_mentioned* with *person_mentioned*Ingram*/person_mentioned* agreet------------------------------- . 50*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Huff*/person_mentioned* to *person_mentioned*Williams*/person_mentioned*, Note---------------------------------- . 50*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Cartwright*/person_mentioned* to *person_mentioned*Franks*/person_mentioned* 3 Notes--------------------------- 1. 50*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Hudson*/person_mentioned* to *person_mentioned*Irons*/person_mentioned* Note---------------------------------- 50*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Cummings*/person_mentioned* to *person_mentioned*Cummings*/person_mentioned* transfer------------------------ 05*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Scott*/person_mentioned* to *person_mentioned*Pettus*/person_mentioned* note------------------------------------ 50*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Pettus*/person_mentioned* to *person_mentioned*Cooper*/person_mentioned*---------------------------------------- 50*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Sandoval*/person_mentioned*s petition-------------------------------------- 50*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="12-xx-1825">Dec*/date_mentioned*, d.—35 seals of 1.50-------------------------------52. 50*/p*
*p*45 do .50-----------------------------------------22. 50*/p*
*p*[Endorsed:] Stamp paper paid by *person_mentioned*S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned* to the *person_mentioned*Govr*/person_mentioned*. as will appear by receipts*/p*
